ctxs.txt: public static void main(String[] args) {   <BUG> float operand1 = 10; </BUG>  double operand2 = 5;  System.out.println("Addition: " + add(operand1, operand2)); System.out.println("Subtraction: " + subtract(operand1, operand2)); System.out.println("Multiplication: " + multiply(operand1, operand2));  try { System.out.println("Division: " + divide(operand1, operand2)); } catch (ArithmeticException e) { System.out.println(e.getMessage()); } }
